directions: In a large bowl, toss the lettuce and cheese.
In a separate bowl, mix together the dressing, taco seasoning, and beans.

Brown ground beef in a large skillet over medium-high heat, and drain.  Add the ground beef and the dressing mixture to the lettuce and cheese, and mix well. Refrigerate until just before serving, then crush the tortilla chips while still in the bag and combine them with the salad.
title: Messy Taco Salad
